entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix race in ResetInteractiveWindowFromProjectCommand #71871
  • .NET WinForms: IntelliSense remark IDE0051 shown for own class methods, but not for Form class methods #71870

Closed

  • I`m having problems using Collection Expressions after the latest update of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3 #71843
  • OpenProjectAsync() is failing in docker container with base image of mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0 #71784
  • Broke API Compatibility #71866

PullRequests

Created

  • Use extensions to make reading/writing streams easier #71882
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NewtonsoftJsonVersion problem #71876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove pointless parameter #71875
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fetch all changed projects in a single sync call #71874
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing" #71873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add an API to fetch diagnostics with no registered code fix from the CodeFixService #71868
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Prevent setting the vs icon information if it doesn't differ from the kind. #71864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused functionality #71878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Change NRT annotation in SG code #71861
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use raw strings in tests #71834
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config in main after 17.10 P1 snap #71863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71860
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reorder calls so we don't need to fetch something unchanged. #71859
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Get diagnostic without codefix #71833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
